name: Lanakis the Chosen

skills.name: Chosen's Touch
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on this Champion for 1 turn if the attack is critical.

Damage based on: [ATK]
Continuous Heal
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Companions of Fate
skills.raw_description:
Teams up with 3 random allies to attack a single enemy. The allies joining the attack will use their default skills. Fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 30%. Increases the duration of all ally buffs by 1 turn.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Banner of Legend
skills.raw_description:
Places a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff and a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Has a 25% chance of granting an Extra Turn.

Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Dark Elves is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 30 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Fallen from grace in their homelands of Aravia, the Dark Elves inhabit the forests that border the realms of Teleria. They see persecutions in Kaerok rather as a boon than a bane supplying them with a stream of silver. They have set up tolls for those anxious to pass safely, but woe betide those who cannot pay.

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Lanakis the Chosen is a legendary assist champion from the faction Dark Elves doing magic damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

structured_data.description: Member of the faction Dark Elves, Lanakis the Chosen is a champion of Legendary rarity and of Assist type
